job_details.degree_required: BS in Computer Science/Engineering, or equivalent

jd: Hi,Hope you are doing great!!please send me an updated copy of your resume and below details.Position:Data engineerLocation:Bay Area, CA has to go inperson. Every day into work.Duration:Long termJob Description:GCP 4 years. Java 1 year mandatory.As a Principal Big Data Engineer, you will be an integral member of our data ingestion and processing platform team responsible for architecture, design and development. Having the dynamic ability to adapt to conventional big-data frameworks and tools with the use-cases required by the project Ability to communicate with research and development teams and data scientists, finding bottlenecks and resolving them Design and implement different architectural models for our scalable data processing, as well as scalable data storage Build tools for proper data ingestion from multiple heterogeneous sources Skills:3+ years of experience in design and implementation in an environment with hundreds of terabytes of data.3+ years of experience with large data processing tools such as: Dataflow, GKE, BQ, Beam.3+ years of experience with Java.Can-do attitude on problem solving, quality and ability to execute.Excellent inter-personal and teamwork skills. Education:BS in Computer Science/Engineering, or equivalent 5+ experience.MS in Computer Science/ Engineering, or equivalent 3+ experiencePlease write years of experience beside each:Principal Data Engineerarchitecture,design developmentJavaDataflowGKEBQ Beam* Good communication and interpersonal skills.If you are interested in this job position mentioned please respond with your resume in MS word format with these details.Full Name:Current Location:Contact No (Cell Number):Email ID:Skype id:Linkedin id:Visa Status:Availability:Currently on Project (Y/N):Open to relocate:Last 4 digits of SSN:Passport No:Total Exp:US Exp:Rate: Thanks & Regards Karthik KalooriResource Manager | IDEAON1855, Gateway Blvd, Ste 170, Concord, CA www.ideaoninc.comhttps://www.ideaoninc.com/compliance-training-for-a-modern-workforce/
